description.en: (Physical Damage) Deals 120% damage, knock back 2 spaces and inflicting [Move Down 1] for 1 turn.
description.ch-tr: （物理傷害）造成120%傷害，擊退2格，對目標施加[▼移動1]，持續1回合。

description.en: (Passive). Take [Physical Attacks] for allies within 2 spaces. When activated increase defense by 20% at most 1 time per turn.
description.ch-tr: （被動）替自身範圍2格內所有友軍承受[物理攻擊]。發動時，防禦提高20%，每回合最多生效1次。

description.en: (Passive) Gain 10% defense for each ally within 2 spaces, max 40%.
description.ch-tr: （被動）自身範圍2格每存在1個友軍，防禦提高10%，最多40%。

description.en: (Support) Heal allies within 3 spaces, restoring 20% health and gaining [Attack Up 1], [Defense Up 1]. Take [Physical Attacks] for allies within 2 spaces for 2 turns.
description.ch-tr: （支援）治療範圍3格內所有己方，回復20%生命值，獲得[▲攻擊1]、[▲物防1]增益，物防提高20%。替自身範圍2格內所有友軍承受[物理攻擊]，持續2回合。

description.en: (Physical Damage) Select 1 enemy within your cross, charge to the their side and deal 130% damage, knock back 2 spaces.
description.ch-tr: （物理傷害）選擇自身十字範圍內1名敵人，衝鋒到其身邊並造成130%傷害，擊退2格。

description.en: (Reaction) When receiving a heal, gain [Damage Prevention 2] for 2 turns.
description.ch-tr: （反應）受到治療後獲得[免傷2]，持續2回合。

description.en: (Reaction) When attacked by [Front or Side] in melee, 100% chance to activate [Block] then counterattack, dealing 70% physical damage to the opponent once per turn.
description.ch-tr: （反應）被[正、側方]近戰攻擊時，100%概率觸發[格擋]，觸發後反擊，造成對方70%物理傷害，每回合最多生效1次。

description.en: (Aura) Increase attack by 10% and defense by 20% for all allies from the “Sword of Convallaria” faction.
description.ch-tr: （光環）場上所有陣營為〈鈴蘭之劍〉的己方，攻擊提高10%，防禦提高20%。

description.en: (Heal) [Instant], Single-target heal, restoring 30% of the target’s health.
description.ch-tr: （治療）[瞬發]，單體治療，回復目標30%生命值。

description.en: (Basic Attack) Deals 100% Physical Damage inflicting [Defense Down 1], [Magic Defense Down 1] to the target for 2 turns.
description.ch-tr: （普攻）造成100%物理傷害，對目標對敵人造成[▼物防1][▼魔防1]，持續2回合。
（物理傷害）造成1次20%的傷害，3次50%的傷害，擊退2格。

description.en: (Support) Gain [Damage Prevention 4], [Mind’s Eye], and [x Interference] for 3 turns
description.ch-tr: （支援）獲得[免傷4]增益，受到傷害降低40%。[心眼]和[×干擾]，持續3回合。
